sentences.en: Colorfully illuminated trees and sculptures fill a park in Harbin, China on Wednesday , Jan . 6, 2010.
sentences.cn: 喜洋洋照明的树木和雕塑填补了哈尔滨, 周三中国公园, 2010年1月6日.

sentences.en: Dear gardener! with your elaborate cultivation, the flowers open so colorfully, laugh so joyfully.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的园丁! 鲜花是在您的精心培植下, 才开得那么艳丽多彩, 才笑得那样欢畅.

sentences.en: In the forests, a lot of trees are blossoming colorfully.
sentences.cn: 在树林里, 许多的树木都开满了鲜艳的花朵.

sentences.en: Liu to the promise which small promised colorfully already cashed before Washington.
sentences.cn: 刘朝华生前对小艳许下的诺言已经兑现了.

sentences.en: Many colorfully dressed girls were working in the fields.
sentences.cn: 许多穿红戴绿的姑娘在田间劳动.

sentences.en: Present stannic city elite to live colorfully.
sentences.cn: 闪现锡城精英多彩生活.

sentences.en: Sleeves, collars and trouser cuffs are colorfully trimmed.
sentences.cn: 在袖子, 衣领和裤子的翻边处有色彩鲜艳的点缀.

sentences.en: That's what he told us again and again in his campaign, not as colorfully as Edwards, but ultimately more convincingly.
sentences.cn: 那也是他在竞选中一次次告诉大家的，尽管言语没有爱德华说的那么有文采，但最终却更加让人信服。

sentences.en: These old people are colorfully dressed, which makes them look full of vigor.
sentences.cn: 这些老年人穿红着绿, 看起来很精神.

sentences.en: Traditional clothing consists of colorfully embroidered shirts and dresses and in some regions loose-fitting pants for women.
sentences.cn: 传统的服装包括色彩绚丽的刺绣衬衫和裙子，在某些地区女性则穿宽松的裤子。

sentences.en: With its wide streets and colorfully painted houses, the city combines Spanish and Caribbean traditions.
sentences.cn: 这座城市融合了西班牙和加勒比海的建筑传统,有着宽阔的街道和色彩缤纷的房子.

sentences.en: You gave me life, I will live colorfully for us.
sentences.cn: 你给了我生命, 我要为我们活得精彩.

trans.tran_cn: 华美的, 富有色彩的
